data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: If you could give one piece of advice to your younger self, what would you say? Explain why this advice is so important.
data.answer:
If I could go back and give younger self a piece of advice, I would say it would be allocating more time to do physical exercise. 
Looking back, when I was young, I spent the majority of my time studying, working and hanging out with friends. However, I neglected my own body and my own health. After I turned 25, my basal metabolic rate started to slow down due to a lack of muscle composition and I began to put on weight. Also, some health issues began to trouble me. Worse still, I became inactive physically and kept putting on more weight. If I could incorporate taking physical exerciser into my daily routine when I was younger, my health condition would be much better.
